name: Only Souls
description:
Explore all the different dimensions to complete God's quest: kill all Satan's minions.Try and go the furthest in this Roguelike Story-Based game!

Kill quirky monsters,

Unlock all the characters,

and don't disappoint God...

----------------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Left click to shoot

E to interact

----------------------------------------------

This game is made 100% by me in Unity. The game isn't done but if you could support me it would mean so much to me. You can support me by following me on my social medias and maybe even a donation (but don't feel obligated ^^)

Thanks for visiting the game and have a great playthrough!
